metadata.description: Sample JSON data for Study Streaks platform - Weobley Primary School

clubs.name: Reading Club
clubs.description: Daily reading to build fluency and love of books
clubs.subject: Reading

clubs.name: Number Club
clubs.description: Daily number work to build mathematical fluency
clubs.subject: Mathematics

clubs.name: Spelling Club
clubs.description: Daily spelling practice to improve writing confidence
clubs.subject: English

club_levels.description: Building basic reading confidence and stamina

successCriteria.fluency: Can read simple sentences with support
successCriteria.engagement: Shows interest in books and stories

club_levels.description: Number bonds to 10 and simple addition
Number bonds to 20 and addition/subtraction within 20

successCriteria.speed: Recall most bonds to 20 within 5 seconds
successCriteria.understanding: Can use number line and hundred square

club_levels.description: Common words and simple phonics patterns

successCriteria.accuracy: Can spell 80% of Reception common words
successCriteria.application: Uses correct spelling in simple sentences

class_club_levels.notes: Starting level for all Year 4 students

parentFeedback.latest: Olivia is really enjoying her reading time
James finds reading challenging but is trying hard
Sophia loves reading and often reads extra books

homework_completions.notes: Read together on the sofa before bedtime
homework_completions.parentFeedback: Olivia read with great expression and asked lots of questions about the story
Good accuracy on number bonds, getting much faster
James worked independently and showed his working
Sophia read fluently and summarised the chapter beautifully

reading_log_entries.studentComment: I love the funny words the BFG uses!
reading_log_entries.parentComment: Olivia read with great expression and asked lots of questions about the story
discussionPoints: Why does the BFG speak differently?
What makes dreams good or bad?

reading_log_entries.studentComment: Matilda is so clever! I wish I could move things with my mind too
reading_log_entries.parentComment: Sophia read fluently and summarised the chapter beautifully
discussionPoints: How does Matilda discover her powers?
Why is reading so important to Matilda?

streak_pauses.reasonDescription: Student was unwell with flu symptoms

buddy_group_invitations.personalMessage: Would you like to be reading buddies? We can help each other with our streaks!
James, would you like to join our buddy group? We can support each other!

achievements.name: First Week Champion
achievements.description: Completed homework for 7 days in a row

achievements.name: Reading Champion
achievements.description: Achieved longest reading streak of 10+ days

stickers.name: First Week Streak
stickers.description: Completed your very first week of Study Streaks

prizes.name: 10 Book Voucher
prizes.description: 10 voucher to spend at Waterstones or any good bookshop
prizes.announcementTemplate: Congratulations to {student_name} for winning a 10 book voucher!

prizes.name: Pizza Lunch with Head Teacher
prizes.description: Special pizza lunch with the Head Teacher in the school office
prizes.announcementTemplate: What an honour! {student_name} has won pizza lunch with our Head Teacher!

prizes.name: Special Study Streaks Pencils
prizes.description: Set of 3 special Study Streaks pencils with motivational messages
prizes.announcementTemplate: Well done {student_name}! Thank you for your fantastic homework efforts!

eligibility_criteria.name: Active Reader - 4 Days Weekly
eligibility_criteria.description: Students who complete reading homework 4+ days per week for 4 weeks

eligibility_criteria.name: Consistent Effort Across All Clubs
eligibility_criteria.description: Students showing consistent effort across reading, number and spelling clubs

prize_draws.drawNotes: Only one student met the reading criteria this month
All students were active this week - well done everyone!

prize_winners.deliveryNotes: Presented during afternoon registration with class applause
prize_winners.thankYouMessage: Thank you so much! I can't wait to choose some new books!
prize_winners.prizeRecommendation: This is the best prize ever! I love reading!
prize_winners.notes: Sophia was absolutely delighted - her reading efforts really paid off

prize_winners.deliveryNotes: Small surprise to say thank you for consistent homework efforts
Recognition of good homework efforts especially in maths
prize_winners.thankYouMessage: Thanks Mrs Williams! I'll use these for my number work
prize_winners.notes: James was pleased with the recognition
